verses.verse: <S%H3588>"When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> and <S%H1166>marries<s%> her, and it <S%H1961>happens<s%> that she <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1697>some<s%> <S%H6172>indecency<s%> in her, and he <S%H3789>writes<s%> her a <S%H5612>certificate<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce<s%> and <S%H5414>puts<s%> [it] in her <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H7971>sends<s%> her out from his <S%H1004>house,<s%>
and she <S%H3318>leaves<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H1980>goes<s%> and <S%H1961>becomes<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> man's [wife,]

and if the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8130>turns<s%> <S%H8130>against<s%> her and <S%H3789>writes<s%> her a <S%H5612>certificate<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce<s%> and <S%H5414>puts<s%> [it] in her <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H7971>sends<s%> her out of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> her to be his <S%H802>wife,<s%>

[then] her <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1167>husband<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H7971>away<s%> is not <S%H3201>allowed<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H7725>again<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H310>since<s%> <S%H834><s%> she has been <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and you shall not <S%H2398>bring<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you as an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> he shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out with the <S%H6635>army,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H5674>charged<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>duty;<s%> he shall be <S%H9345>free<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> and shall <S%H8055>give<s%> <S%H8055>happiness<s%> to his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he has <S%H3947>taken.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> one shall <S%H9111>take<s%> a <S%H7347>handmill<s%> or an <S%H7393>upper<s%> <S%H7393>millstone<s%> in <S%H9111>pledge,<s%> for he would be <S%H9111>taking<s%> a <S%H5315>life<s%> in <S%H9111>pledge.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H4672>caught<s%> <S%H1589>kidnapping<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> of his <S%H251>countrymen<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H9417>deals<s%> with him <S%H9417>violently,<s%> or <S%H4376>sells<s%> him, then that <S%H1590>thief<s%> shall <S%H4191>die;<s%> so you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

"Be <S%H8104>careful<s%> against an <S%H5061>infection<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> that you <S%H3966>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> you; as I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, so you shall be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>
<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> as you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H5383>make<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> a <S%H4859>loan<s%> of <S%H3972>any<s%> <S%H3972>sort,<s%> you shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H5670>take<s%> his <S%H5667>pledge.<s%>

"You shall <S%H5975>remain<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H5383>make<s%> the <S%H5383>loan<s%> shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> out to you.
"And <S%H518>if<s%> he is a <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> you shall not <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H5667>pledge.<s%>

"When the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> down you shall <S%H7725>surely<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> to him, that he may <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in his <S%H8008>cloak<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you; and it will be <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> for you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant<s%> <S%H834>[who<s%> is] <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> <S%H4480>whether<s%> [he is] one of your <S%H251>countrymen<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> one of your <S%H1616>aliens<s%> who is in your <S%H776>land<s%> in your <S%H8179>towns.<s%>

"You shall <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H7939>wages<s%> on his <S%H3117>day<s%> before the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>sets,<s%> for he is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H5375>sets<s%> his <S%H5315>heart<s%> on it; so that he may not <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and it <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> in you.

"Fathers shall not be <S%H1>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> for [their] <S%H4191>sons,<s%> <S%H1121>nor<s%> shall <S%H3808>sons<s%> be <S%H1121>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> for [their] fathers; <S%H4191>everyone<s%> shall be <S%H1>put<s%> to <S%H376>death<s%> for his own <S%H4191>sin.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H4941>justice<s%> due an <S%H1616>alien<s%> [or] an <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H9111>take<s%> a widow's <S%H899>garment<s%> in <S%H9111>pledge.<s%>

"But you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you from <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H7114>reap<s%> your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in your <S%H7704>field<s%> and have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> you shall not <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H3947>get<s%> it; it shall be for the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> for the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H2251>beat<s%> your <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>tree,<s%> you shall not <S%H9443>go<s%> <S%H9443>over<s%> the <S%H9443>boughs<s%> <S%H310>again;<s%> it shall be for the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> for the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H1219>gather<s%> the grapes of your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> you shall not <S%H5953>go<s%> <S%H5953>over<s%> it <S%H310>again;<s%> it shall be for the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> for the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>
